title: Dino Gnar visual BUG
body:
When i use the Joke command on gnar while in his Dino skin, instead of putting his boomerang on the ground he sticks it in his left eye D:
this has happened every time i have tried it today (over multiple games) 
could someone check it on their game to see if it is just my game or if it is a global bug 
if it is a global bug please try to fix it if you can, its hard to bear such a cute guy shoving a stick in his eye D:

replies.body: Gnar was playing with it and accidently stabbed himself in the eye.  It's cute with a stick in his face. xd {{champion:150}}
yeah the bug is that he's still in the game. rito fix plz.
dino gnar is so cute, gift me pls
